thread.title: Obama Is Rethinking Pullout in Afghanistan, Officials Say

title: Obama Is Rethinking Pullout in Afghanistan, Officials Say
text:
14 Obama Is Rethinking Pullout in Afghanistan, Officials Say 
The New York Times: WASHINGTON â€” With pressure building on the White House to slow or completely halt the withdrawal of American troops from Afghanistan, senior officials said that President Obama appears increasingly willing to keep a force there large enough to carry on the hunt for Al Qaeda and Islamic State militants.
